statements: SELECT * FROM inter_chain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc';
SELECT transaction_time, amount FROM inter_chain_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_time ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_time FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x1234abcd' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_time FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE receiver_address = '0xabcd5678' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_time ASC
SELECT * FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sender_address, receiver_address DESC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM inter_chain_transactions GROUP BY sender_address
SELECT * FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, receiver_address FROM inter_chain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_time DESC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE sender_address='0x123456789abcdef'
SELECT swap_id, initiator_address, participating_address, swap_amount FROM atomic_swaps WHERE swap_status='pending'
SELECT * FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123456' OR receiver_address = '0x654321' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT swap_id, initiator_address FROM atomic_swaps WHERE swap_status = 'pending' ORDER BY swap_id DESC;
SELECT participating_address, swap_amount FROM atomic_swaps WHERE swap_amount >= 500 AND swap_status = 'completed' ORDER BY participating_address;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_time FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_time <= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM inter_chain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, from_chain, to_chain FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT participant1, participant2, asset_type FROM atomic_swaps ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT history_id, transaction_type, timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT swap_id, participant1, amount FROM atomic_swaps WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, from_chain, to_chain, amount FROM inter_chain_transactions WHERE from_chain = 'Ethereum' AND to_chain = 'Binance';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM atomic_swaps WHERE participant1 = 'Alice';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM atomic_swaps;

SELECT th.history_id, th.transaction_type, ic.from_chain, ic.to_chain, ts.timestamp FROM transaction_history th JOIN inter_chain_transactions ic ON th.transaction_id = ic.transaction_id JOIN atomic_swaps ts ON th.swap_id = ts.swap_id ORDER BY ts.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM InterChainTransactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_chain, receiver_chain, amount, timestamp FROM InterChainTransactions WHERE sender_chain = 'Ethereum';
SELECT * FROM AtomicSwaps ORDER BY swap_amount DESC;
SELECT swap_id, initiator, acceptor, status FROM AtomicSwaps WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_details, timestamp FROM InterChainTransactionLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InterChainTransactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_chain, receiver_chain, amount FROM InterChainTransactions WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_chain, receiver_chain, timestamp FROM InterChainTransactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM AtomicSwaps WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY swap_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT initiator, acceptor, status FROM AtomicSwaps WHERE initiator = 'Alice' OR acceptor = 'Bob' ORDER BY swap_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM interchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, from_chain, to_chain, amount FROM interchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT swap_id, initiator_address, recipient_address, status FROM atomic_swaps ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT sender_address, description FROM transaction_details WHERE receiver_address = 'Alice';
SELECT chain_name, chain_type FROM chain_info WHERE chain_type = 'public';
SELECT * FROM interchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, from_chain, to_chain, amount FROM interchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT swap_id, initiator_address, recipient_address, status, start_time FROM atomic_swaps WHERE status='active' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT chain_id, chain_name, chain_type FROM chain_info;
